name: Disco Dash
description:
Disco Dash!

Created for the CSUN Game Dev Club Game Jam 11/4/16 - 11/6/16

Theme

Dog, Arcane, Disco.

We chose Dog/Disco.

Controls

WASD / Xbox analog stick to move

Mouse click / Xbox bumpers / Space to dash

R to restart

Team

Ben Villalobos - Programmer

Armand Abrahamian - Programmer

David Koenig - Artist / Animation

Miguel Leyva - Sound / Music
